resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104281</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104281</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101373</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Images of the Sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilder der Sonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Images du soleil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Imagens do sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagini del sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνες του ήλιου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Imágenes del sol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Skylab's solar experiments captured images of the sun in incredible detail and revealed unknown aspects of the Sun.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Skylabs Solarexperimente erfaßte Bilder der Sonne
ausführlich unglaubliches und aufgedeckte unbekannte Aspekte der 
Sonne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les images capturées par expériences solaires du
Skylab du soleil dans le détail incroyable et les aspects inconnus 
indiqués du soleil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Imagens capturadas de Skylab experiências solares
do sol no detalhe incredible e aspectos desconhecidos revelados do 
sol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagini bloccate esperimenti solari dello Skylab 
del sole in dettaglio incredibile e funzioni sconosciute rivelarici 
del sole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Skylab τα ηλιακά πειράματα συνέλαβαν τις εικόνες 
του ήλιου με απίστευτες λεπτομέρειες και αποκάλυψαν άγνωστες 
πτυχές του ήλιου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Imágenes capturadas experimentos solares de 
Skylab del sol en detalle increíble y aspectos desconocidos revelados
del sol.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:SCIVEE-TEAM
FN:SCIVEE-TEAM
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101373</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 3.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104281</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/images-of-the-sun</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
